thread.section_title: Road Runner Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Road Runner Sports | www.roadrunnersports.com
thread.title: Mark Hamrick
thread.title_full: Road Runner Sports reviewed by Mark Hamrick

author: Mark Hamrick
title: Mark Hamrick
text: I enjoy the great selection. I spend a lot of time studying different shoes. Plenty of opportunities to get great deals. I live >30 miles from a running store and its hard for me to get there when they are open. I hate big box stores; I always end up helping other customers pick shoes when I go. RRS has been my trusted running shoe source for 15+ years. Provided shoes for all the training miles for 7 marathons, countless halfs, 10K's and 5K's. I've evolved from one type of shoe to another over the years.
